title: A/B Test an Email Subject Line
description: A marketer wants to test two different subject lines for a promotional email to see which one has a better open rate.

tasks.description: Define the two subject lines (A and B) to be tested.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly inputs the two subject lines.

tasks.description: Select the target audience and configure the A/B test to send each version to 50% of the audience.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sets up the split test parameters.
System sends the emails with the two different subject lines.

tasks.description: After 24 hours, compare the open rates for version A and version B to determine the winner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the results and identifies the subject line with the higher open rate.
